    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Urejevalniki besedil</string>
            <string language="en">Word processors</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Textverarbeitungsgeräte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Unités de traitement de texte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Processadores de palavra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programmi di trattamento di testi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επεξεργαστές λέξεων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Procesadores de textos</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Predstavitev osnovnega in naprednega delo z urejevalnikom besedil. Predstavljena sta urejevalnika Microsoft Word in OpenOffice.</string>
            <string language="en">Introduction to basic and advanced features of typical word processor. Microsoft Word and OpenOffice are presented.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">evizus</string>
            <string language="en">evizus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">microsoft word</string>
            <string language="en">microsoft word</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">openoffice</string>
            <string language="en">openoffice</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">urejevalnik besedil</string>
            <string language="en">word processor</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einleitung in eine grundlegenden und 
hochentwickelten Merkmale des typischen Textverarbeitungsgerätes. 
Microsoft Word und OpenOffice werden dargestellt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Introduction aux dispositifs de base et avançés
de l'unité de traitement de texte typique. Microsoft Word et 
OpenOffice sont présentés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Introdução às características básicas e 
avançadas do processador de palavra típico. A palavra e 
OpenOffice de Microsoft são apresentados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Introduzione alle caratteristiche di base ed 
avanzate del programma di trattamento di testi tipico. La parola
ed OpenOffice del Microsoft sono presentati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εισαγωγή στα βασικά και προηγμένα χαρακτηριστικά 
γνωρίσματα του χαρακτηριστικού επεξεργαστή λέξεων. 
Θ*Μηθροσοφτ Word και OpenOffice παρουσιάζονται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Introducción a las características básicas y 
avanzadas del procesador de textos típico. Se presentan 
Microsoft Word y OpenOffice.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">evizus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Microsoft Word</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
